## packet device delete

Deletes a device

### Synopsis

Example:	

  packet device delete -i [device_UUID]
  
	

```
packet device delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force       Force removal of the device
  -h, --help        Help for delete
  -i, --id string   UUID of the device
```
